title: Scattered
description:
Nina Mozes, Adam Newman and Marga Gomez share stories about lost punchlines, lost virginity and lost passports.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (AURAGRAPH, Adam Newman, Blondie, kevin Allison, Nina Mozes, Marga Gomez, R.E.M., John LaSala)
